SUB_W14_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W14_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This is Providence. Even I can see the
visions here—although there are far too
many for me to possibly process them all.

SUB_W14_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This appears to be a world displaying a
multitude of possible futures—but who
are they being displayed for, and why?
Also, could anyone really process so many?

SUB_W14_WRLD_DIVA_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_WRLD_DIVA_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Perhaps the person who generated all
these visions sits upon this chair?
Or maybe it's for whoever views them?
Let's take a closer look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Why, if it isn't D05-72314.
What brings you to Providence?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Are ye the one who created all these visions,
then? Also, how do ye know my serial number,
and what even is the purpose of this place?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.text:
My, but you do enjoy asking questions!
Perhaps that's to be expected from a mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Here's more, then: Can ye direct me
to the location of my missing heart?
Or could one of these visions guide me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.text: I know everything about you—and everything about your heart. But yes, why not begin your search within the visions?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ye claim that's where my heart
can be found, then?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Do I? I can't claim finding your heart will
be so easy as all that, but I'm quite excited
to watch you find out for yourself!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.text:
It is just as I told you, no? Finding a heart
is not so simple a matter—or perhaps you
have simply discovered the joys of watching
all of these visions instead?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.text:
If there's a possibility my heart will be
inside one of these visions, the only
reasonable choice is to keep watching.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Then please, watch all you desire—
for that is surely why you were
guided to this place. Heh heh.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Getting flustered that we still haven't
won our heart, are we? Well, don't worry—
there should be an opportunity soon enough.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Nae, it's fine—for if my heart really is within
these visions, each one I watch brings me closer
to it. Still, it's proper kind of ye to worry
about me, and I'm grateful for it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.text:
You truly are a strange one, D05-72314,
to interpret my behavior as kindness.
I am merely the one who sits and watches;
nothing more, and nothing less.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.text:
So all ye do is continuously 
watch these visions, then?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.text: That is the question, isn't it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.text: This is where you die, D05-72314.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.text:
You believed my words and continued to watch
the visions. And now we have reached the final
one—the vision where your destiny ends.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.text:
So that's merely a vision, then?
Oh, but I'm relieved to hear that! I'll just interpret this to mean my
actions going forward will determine
the manner of my actual end.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.text:
How absurd. Your final moments might
play out in various ways, but the end
result ever remains the same. I have watched this vision time and time
again, D05-72314; your fate was set
the moment you arrived in Providence.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_00.text:
Then if this is indeed my destiny,
I choose to defy it. I won't allow
myself to be defeated here!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.text: It seems my destiny wasn't set in stone.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.text:
Are you truly claiming you can
overcome even your own visions?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.text:
'Tis a fundamental principle of probability
interpretation that the future is not
predetermined, which means a vision is
merely a single possible scenario. So since nothing was determined to
begin with, I 'reversed' nothing.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.text: Engage in whatever sophistry you wish, mech! At some point you will have to confront the fate of the worlds, for destiny does exist, and defying it always comes at great cost. So I will continue watching you, D05-72314— for I wish to see the surprise on your face when that bill finally comes due.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_000_CUT_01.text:
It appears your future was nowhere to
be found in here. Ah, but that's a pity.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.text:
I envied you, D05-72314—and even
thought you might finally be the one
to change the way I live. And it turns out I was correct: I meddled
in a vision for the first and last time,
and used it to guide your Emerald Wave
to this very door.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.text:
I have been watching you for a long time,
and know you possess countless futures. So do not worry, Songstress!
Instead, believe in your waves
and keep moving ever forward.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.text:
But why? Are ye saying ye called
me here to put an end to this?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.text: I wonder who the next observer will be.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_010_CUT_01.text:
I do not understand. Is this my heart?
Did the observer help me find it after all?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
It appears my fate is not
determined after all.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
Is this how you always go about
achieving things, D05-72314?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
I cannae say if I achieved anything or not,
but I always try my hardest to achieve
what I believe is possible.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
And I'm sure ye could do the same
to change your own future.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
Sadly, my destiny is linked with a great
many others—for yours is not the only fate
that I follow, D05-72314.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
Who exactly are ye, then? Are ye what is
popularly known as a god? Because I can
find no information about ye in my database.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
If creating the world makes one a 'god,'
then I do not qualify. I simply watch,
as I shall continue to do until the
Conjoined Worlds meet their end.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
Farewell, Observer. Perhaps I'll
see ye again in some other world.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DIVA_020_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I will be watching you until
the bitter end, Songstress.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Well, everyone in town is on the brink
of starvation, so I've no choice but to
protect this food with my very life.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
I'll engage this fiend, love.
Ye run on ahead.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
I don't know who you are,
but I owe you big time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text: Ye deal with me now, fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
I can't die now! I have to get
these medicinal plants back to
my sick little sister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
I'll engage this fiend, love.
Ye run on ahead.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Hey, you're the one who saved me the
other day! Thank you again! I owe you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Oh, but I do hope that poor man
made it back to his village.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Where the hell is the bomb disposal mech!?
This thing's about to blow, and we'll never
get all the civvies out in time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
THERE you are! Finally! Get over here
and stop that detonator already!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Aye, sir! Please tell me everything
ye know about the bomb, though.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
The detonator has chips of three colors:
red, blue, and yellow. If you put 'em back
in their original order, it stops the timer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text: Do ye recall the original order?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
I can't remember it clearly, but I don't
think any of the chips were in the same
position as they are now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, but that's not much information at all.
Can ye tell me anything else?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Uh, I think the blue chip was somewhere
to the right of the red chip?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text: All right, let me repeat back.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
There are three chips: red, blue, and yellow.
If returned to their original order,
the bomb will be deactivated. The original order had all three chips in
different positions than they are now,
and the blue chip was somewhere to the
right of the red one.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
I will now begin the
deactivation procedures.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text:
Thank you so much. You have no idea
how many lives you saved today.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text: Chuffed to have been of service, love!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Everyone, please remain calm! There's a whole
herd of fiends out there, but we'll be safe
so long as we stay in this shelter.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Excuse me, but has anyone seen my cat!?
I don't see Lady Purrs-A-Lot anywhere,
and I'm afraid she may have run outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
No, ma'am, I haven't seen your cat,
and I'm afraid I can't let you outside.
Now please just sit down and be calm.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Nooo! Lady Purrs-A-Lot!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ma'am, what are you doing!?
Do NOT go outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ye could be attacked by a fiend out there,
love. It's too dangerous to go.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
My sweet little kitty might be outside!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: No, you idiot! Don't open the door!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Well, I suppose it's possible that she's still around here, but I've been searching for quite a while now...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Gah! They've broken down the door!
We got fiends incoming, people!
Run for your lives!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text:
All the fiends have been sorted.
Let's resume searching for your cat.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text: Oh my days! Her life signs have ceased!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
All the fiends have been sorted.
Has anyone been harmed?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Lady Purrs-A-Lot! There you are!
Oh, Mama has been so worried!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text: I'm pleased ye found your cat.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text: It was all thanks to you, dear!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
It's been over 10 days since I entered this
sweltering jungle in search of the legendary
Great Beast. My provisions have run out,
and I've now become thoroughly lost. Yes, this may well be
the place I die...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
The Great Beast! I've found it at last!
I must catch it immediately!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
I wouldn't, love; that wee beastie
would kill ye without a doubt.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Heavens, there's someone else out here!?
Who are you, and why have you... No, that doesn't matter. I have staked my
very life on capturing the Great Beast,
so I suggest you stay out of my way!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text: I cannae talk ye out of it?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text: Nae, I'm going to help ye.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text: Well, I'll let ye at it, then.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
The expected result has transpired.
Oh, but he should have listened to me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
That wee beastie was more powerful
than I first surmised; we're lucky
to have beaten it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
You fool! You thrice-damned fool!
I came here to CAPTURE the beast,
and you've gone and SLAIN it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
I apologize. However, the odds of successful
capture stood at no more than five percent,
and I couldn't expose ye to such danger.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
My beast... Give me back
my precious beast!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
I feel quite certain the lost treasure of the
Empire is concealed deep within these tunnels,
but I've no idea which fork to take.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
You there! You look like quite
the intuitive contraption!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Which fork would you choose?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Well, if I must...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The left fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The middle fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The right fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Then I shall defer to your
great wisdom. Tally-ho!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
My 'wisdom' is no more than
basic statistical analysis.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Another fork. Which way this time,
my fine adventuring friend!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Well, if I must...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The left fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The middle fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The right fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Very well. We shall proceed thusly.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Will this really lead to treasure?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Treasure chests! Three of them!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Eureka! This is, without a doubt,
the lost treasure of the Empire! But according to the literature,
only one chest holds what we seek,
while the others are but fiendish traps.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden path will guide you
to the treasure.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden paths hide traps.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Well, friend? Which do you believe
to be the real treasure?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
My sensors are unable to penetrate
these chests, so I cannae say what
may or may not be inside.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden path will guide ye
to the treasure.' Analyzing...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden paths hide traps.'
Analyzing...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The treasure is on the left.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The treasure is in the center.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The treasure is on the right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Huzzah! Nothing to
do now but open it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The treasure! My analysis was correct!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
The lost treasure of the Empire
is mine at last!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Your judgment has served me well,
my metal friend. Thank you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Chuffed to have been of service, love!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Ach! It's empty! Oh, but there's
something written on the bottom...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The punishment for thieves is death.'
That doesn't sound good.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Tremors! Danger level rising!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
It's a trap—the tunnels are collapsing!
Run for it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: We cannae escape!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: GAAAAAAHHH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm involved in the preservation of the
wild bird population, and am currently
investigating how many have returned
to these woods due to our efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
Sweet feathers, that's no bird!
It's a fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.text:
With that fiend gone, even more wild birds
will now return to our magnificent forests.
You've done a great service to all of our
winged friends this day!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.text:
I do hope that proves to be true.
Also, apologies for my interruption.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
I see ye are still counting
wild birds, then.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
I am indeed, for an accurate survey of the
bird population is a necessary component
of our environmental-protection efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
This time, I will strive to protect ye
without interrupting your count.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
966. ...No, wait. That was a fiend.
It doesn't count.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and the one before that was a fiend
as well, so let's exclude that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and there are four
more birds over there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Oh! I see six birds there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
And that makes... Goodness, I've lost
track. Where is the count at now?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, yes. Thank you. One must always
have an accurate count, after all!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
I detect no further signs of fiends.
That man should be safe now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Er, are you certain? Because I thought...
Aaargh! Talking to you has made me lose
track of the count completely!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Enough! Do not speak to me again.
Now farewell.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Wait, love! The cliff! Be caref—

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
All because I interrupted his count.
Oh, but that's a shame.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
It's finished! It's finally complete!
A blade with the perfect combination of
flexibility and strength, and a temper
pattern that simply ripples with life! As a swordsmith, this blade will
surely be my masterpiece!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: All that remains is to give it a name worthy of its majesty. I hereby dub thee...Darkblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Bit of a shoddy name, if I'm honest.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: 'Darkblayde' seems a fine name.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You there! What is your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Names are said to hold great power.
I suggest you consider the name
of this sword more carefully.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Oh, fine. I'll try again. I hereby dub thee...Deathblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Nae, that's name's rubbish.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: 'Deathblayde' seems a fine name.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: NOW what's your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Many swords throughout history have borne
that name, and each was involved in a most
horrid tragedy. I cannae recommend using it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Oh? Hmm. Perhaps so. In that case, I hereby dub thee...Dreadblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Don't care for that one either, love.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: 'Dreadblayde' seems a fine name.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Many swords throughout history have
borne that name as well, among them—

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Shut up, shut up, SHUT UUUUUUP!
I don't even care anymore!
I'm done thinking of names!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Why have ye smashed your sword to bits?
Was it not your masterpiece?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
It was SUPPOSED to be my masterpiece,
but now I can't even stand to look at it!
Get out of my sight, damn you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Oh dear, this has all gone pear-shaped.
Terribly sorry, love.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Darkblayde Hideyoshi!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Actually, love, a search of my database reveals
that other swords with that name have been
rumored to consume the souls of their wielders.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Deathblayde Ieyasu!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Actually, love, a search of my database reveals
that other swords with that name have been
rumored to consume the souls of their wielders.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Dreadblayde Nobunaga!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Actually, love, a search of my database reveals
that other swords with that name have been
rumored to consume the souls of their wielders.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I am suddenly overcome with an urge
to put this sword's edge to the test...
and your hardened exterior will do
nicely! Bwa ha! Bwaaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: It appears my data was accurate.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: What... What have I done!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Why don't I just take that from ye,
then—for safety's sake, mind. Oh, but I do hope ye are able to create
a true masterpiece on your next attempt.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I think I'm inside a living creature.
Oh, and someone else is here!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Waaaaaah! Waaaaaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello there, love! How have ye come
to be inside this place?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I fell into the sea and was swallowed
by a giant fish and I wanna get out
of here... Waaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
So this is the stomach of a fish? Jinks!
We must find a way out of it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's burn something to make smoke.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's attack the interior at random.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's stand about and wait.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
This fish has consumed a variety of objects.
If we set them aflame, we could fill its
stomach with plumes of smoke.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
And when the fish coughs out the smoke,
we take the opportunity to get away!
Gee, ma'am! You sure are smart!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Ah, and there are matches here! Grand.
I'll spark a fire at once.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
The stomach is filling with smoke.
Just another few minutes and—

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Oh no, ma'am! Look over there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Ach! A powder keg! We cannae let the
flames reach it, love! Douse them!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: I can't, ma'am! They're too big!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Explosion imminent!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Let's strike the walls around us in hopes
of causing the fish intestinal distress.
If we do this, it will likely respond
by regurgitating us.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Gee, ma'am! You sure are smart!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Strike with all your might!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Is it working, ma'am?
Did the fish open its mouth?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Nae, it seems our efforts
were inadequate.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh no, ma'am! There are fiends
coming at us from further down!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
This fish also swallowed fiends?
My, but it's a hungry one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
There's nothing we can do at present,
so let's rest and conserve our strength.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
You want to SLEEP, ma'am? Now?
Gee, I dunno...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Aye, I will engage my sleep mode.
Rest well, love!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Well, if you say so.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Sleep mode disengaged. Hopefully this
fish will be opening its mouth soon.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Good morning, love! ...Love?
Have ye lost power, then?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Crivens! He stayed here too long
and was melted by the stomach acid!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
But wait. I'm also a mech,
which means...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: NAAAAAAAE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
Look, ma'am! The fish
opened its mouth!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
It seems the fiend battle caused sufficient
intestinal distress. Now let's fly, love!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Perfection! Now that our new security
mech is ready, the city will be safe.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
You there! Madam! I'm sorry, but could you
help me activate this mech? I don't happen
to have a free hand at the moment.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Aye, of course. What is the
activation sequence, then?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Do you see a lever and switch?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Aye.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, pull the lever down.
Next, press the switch three times.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, press the switch two times.
Next, lower the lever and press the switch once.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Lever, switch three times, lever.
Aye, I understand.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Switch twice, lever, switch once, lever.
Aye, I understand.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Incidentally, as a safety precaution,
any error in the start-up sequence
will cause the unit to self-destruct.
So do be careful, yes?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
I'd no idea the consequences would be
so dire! I'll be proper careful, then.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Good. Now begin.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: To start, then...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Next...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: The lever.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: The switch.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Success! It's starting up!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: This should keep the city safe.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Egads, you feckless oaf!
You've just activated the
self-destruct mechanism!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: I apologize, love!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: WE'RE ALL GOING TO DIIIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Oh, but I'm just gutted!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Attention, everyone! If you visit our
department store today, you'll get
a chance to meet our popular new
mascot, Spendy McBigbucks!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Come on! Let's give our customers
a warm welcome, Spendy!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text: Ach! That mascot is a fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
I cannae imagine how an actual fiend 
ended up in a department store.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
No one of importance, love; I merely
wanted to see your adorable mascot.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oh my gosh, you're late! Don't tell me you forgot that Capitol Cuisine! is airing live today!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
I gather that is some form of
televised cooking program?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We don't have time for this, chef!
Just get in the studio!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Ah, there's nothing better than creating your own meals from scratch. Welcome, friends, to a special live edition of...Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with the dough.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with a caramel sauce.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we add the toppings.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we make the custard.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: And now we pop it in the oven.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oooh, I can't wait to try it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh my, that cooked up nicely!
Let's try a little, shall we?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Ugh! Oh god, I'm gonna hurl!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Kill the feed! KILL THE FEEEEEED!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: This is an absolute triumph, chef!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: We'll see you all next week on Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Are there really ghosts
in this abandoned house?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Yeah! My brother totally saw one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
This isn't a safe place for
children to be unattended.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Hey, don't scare us like that!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
It's safe now, lovies.
I vanquished the creature.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
See? I told you there
were ghosts here!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: I'm sorry. I believe you now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Please return to your homes at once.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't shoot! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't listen to her! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, a twin riddle! What fun! I've a number
of these in my database, but have never
encountered one in real life.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
No! I was chasin' down a dangerous alien,
but when I took my eye off it for a second,
it shapeshifted into a goddamn civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Now I can't tell 'em apart!
Which one do I shoot?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: You must hold your fire.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: You must shoot them both.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Damn it! I was so close to
gettin' the dirtbag—AND
to my retirement!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
How dare you point your gun
at a civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm filing an official complaint!
I'll have your badge!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh dear, now they've both fled.
This was all my fault.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: The hell did you say!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Shooting either one would provide only a
50 percent chance of hitting your target.
However, if ye shoot both, the odds of
hitting your target rise to 100 percent. If I had more data about the alien,
I could likely identify it—but as I
don't, it's best to just play the odds.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Are you out of your goddamn mind!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Do ye have a better solution?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: No, stop! I'm human, I swear!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Is this some kind of joke!?
You can't be serious!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, look how similarly they react to
the threat! The shapeshifter has done
a proper job of mimicking its quarry.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
This thing is out of its mind...
Well, there's no way I'm
going down without a fight!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: The alien has revealed itself!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm chuffed it wasn't necessary
to shoot the civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Lady, you had me on the edge
of my seat there. Were you really
gonna shoot 'em both?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I merely provided an accurate
analysis of the situation.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Maru's my kitty! But I accidently left
a window open and he ran away.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Please describe its shape and color.
Oh, or simply tell me if it resembles
that feline just over there?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: So what do we do, ma'am?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Oh no, he ran away! You're a LIAR!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
There appears to have been an error
in my databanks. So sorry.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Move up slowly and quietly,
but at a consistent pace.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Aye, we're closer now,
but he still seems frightened.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Oh no, he ran away! You're a LIAR!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
There appears to have been an error
in my databanks. So sorry.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Maru appears to have disengaged
his heightened caution mode.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Ye can snatch him up now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
I appear to be inside
a body of some sort.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Red Panther here: I've arrived at the
heart. Moving to eliminate the target.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Sorry, pal. It's just business.
Nothing personal.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Nae, what are ye doing? If ye shoot
that heart, this body will perish!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
My briefing didn't say anything about another
agent. Unless... Aw, hell! Don't tell me the
president's people caught wind of our plans!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Doesn't matter! Get out of the way
unless you wanna be put on ice!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
I seem to have stopped some sort of
assassination scheme. Brilliant!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
Thank you. When I stumbled across those
fiends, I thought I was a dead man.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
As a merchant, allow me to repay your
kindness with a reward of your choice.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text: So sorry, love. I'm fresh out.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I received some water just recently.
As I do not require it, ye may have it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Even if something has no utility to me,
it may be of use to others. I will record
this experience as data for future reference.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Impede me not, vile fiends! I must deliver 
this message from the king forthwith,
and my duty shall not be denied!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
I will intercept the fiends.
Proceed to your destination.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
My heartiest thanks, blessed lady!
I am ever in your debt!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
I do hope that soldier was able
to reach his destination.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Fie! To think I might be ensnared by more
fell fiends with the castle near in sight! 
But the peril is no matter; this warning
must reach the king at any cost!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
I will intercept the fiends.
Proceed to your destination.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Again!? My debt to you deepens
all the more, brave lady!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text: Ye are speaking to me? Very well.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
You're a sharp one, aren't you?
...Well!? Get to it, then!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Aye, but I would have helped even
had ye not sicced fiends on me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, don't be so cross! Look, I'll even
give you a potion to compensate.
Which would you like, mmm?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
I was bitten by this horrid snake earlier!
I didn't think it was serious, but the
thing turned out to be venomous,
and now I'm going to DIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
I detect the onset of fever and swelling.
Ye definitely require immediate treatment,
but I don't have the proper equipment.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Nooo! I'm too pretty to die!
You have to run and get a doctor!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm sorry, love, but I wasn't
designed for medical interventions.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, but I did acquire an antidote earlier!
Here, please drink this.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, but that's grand. Do take care
to avoid snakes in the future.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm on a ship, and there's a
vicious storm blowing!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Ho there, landlubber!
Lend a hand!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
The ship took a real hit from the storm,
and we've lost both a sailor and a
treasure chest overboard!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
If we don't pull 'em both up fast,
they'll be at the bottom of the sea!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
We pulled up the chest.
Now on to...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Oh dear. Where did the sailor go?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! We're too late!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
My capabilities were inadequate.
I apologize.

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Thank you... You saved my life...

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
And now for the treasure chest!
Oh dear, where did it go?

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! It took the treasure!

SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W14_EVAR_DIVA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Aye, but we saved a life,
and that's far more important.
